name: return failure
xml:
<return status="failure">
	<parameter name="error-code" value="503"/>
	<parameter name="error-message" value="Unable to save ASDC artifact"/>
	<parameter name="ack-final" value="Y"/>

name: get-resource: asdc-reference SQLResource
xml:
<get-resource
	plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' 
	resource='SQL'
	key="SELECT vnf_type, vnfc_type, file_category
	     FROM ASDC_REFERENCE
         WHERE artifact_name = $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-name ;"
    force='true'
	pfx='asdc-reference'>

name: save asdc-file SQLResource
xml:
<save 	plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' 
	resource='SQL'
	key='INSERT INTO ASDC_ARTIFACTS
	     SET service_uuid	=  $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.service-uuid ,
	        distribution_id	=  $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.distribution-id ,
	        service_name	=  $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.service-name ,
		service_description	=  $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.service-description ,
		resource_uuid	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.resource-uuid ,
		resource_instance_name	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.resource-instance-name ,
		resource_name	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.resource-name ,
		resource_version	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.resource-version ,
		resource_type	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.resource-type ,
		artifact_uuid	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-uuid ,
		artifact_type	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-type ,
		artifact_version	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-version ,
		artifact_description	= $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-description ,
		internal_version	= $asdc-artifacts.internalversion ,
	        artifact_name       =  $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-name ,
	        artifact_content    =  $convertconfig.escapeData ;'
	    	force='true'

  	pfx='tmp.asdc-artifacts'>

name: return failure
xml:
<return status="failure">
	<parameter name="error-code" value="502"/>
	<parameter name="error-message" value="Unable to retrieve asdc_resource"/>
	<parameter name="ack-final" value="Y"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.openecomp.sdnc.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="file-contents" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.configuration-document-information.document-parameters[0].artifact-contents`"/>

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.openecomp.sdnc.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="error-code" value="503"/>

name: set deploy-error 503
xml:
<set>
	<parameter name="config-document-response.request-id" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.request-information.request-id`" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.status" value="DEPLOY_ERROR" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.error-reason" value="failure to store artifact" />

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.openecomp.sdnc.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="error-code" value="502"/>

name: set: deploy-error-502
xml:
<set>
	<parameter name="config-document-response.request-id" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.request-information.request-id`" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.status" value="DEPLOY_ERROR" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.error-reason" value="missing asdc_reference data for artifact-name" />

name: configure: escapeSQL
xml:
<execute plugin="org.openecomp.sdnc.config.generator.convert.ConvertNode" method="escapeData">
<parameter name="unEscapeData" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-contents`" />
<parameter name="dataType" value="SQL" />
<parameter name="responsePrefix" value="convertconfig" />

name: record
xml:
<record plugin="org.openecomp.sdnc.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="level" value="info"/>
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="__TIMESTAMP__"/>
<parameter name="error-code" value="502"/>

name: return failure
xml:
<return status="failure">
	<parameter name="error-code" value="503"/>
	<parameter name="error-message" value="`$convertconfig.error-message`"/>
	<parameter name="ack-final" value="Y"/>

name: set deploy-error 503
xml:
<set>
	<parameter name="config-document-response.request-id" value="`$configuration-document-request-input.request-information.request-id`" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.status" value="DEPLOY_ERROR" />
	<parameter name="config-document-response.error-reason" value="failure to store artifact" />

name: get-resource: Internal version SQLResource
xml:
<get-resource
	plugin='org.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.resource.sql.SqlResource' 
	resource='SQL'
	key="select IF(max(INTERNAL_VERSION)>0,max(INTERNAL_VERSION)+1,1) as internalversion
	     FROM ASDC_ARTIFACTS
         WHERE ARTIFACT_NAME = $configuration-document-request-input.document-parameters.artifact-name ;"
    force='true'
	pfx='asdc-artifacts'>
